text: The Nebula Nunchucks activate only for the brave and extremely confused.
Cosmic Coffee injects exactly the right amount of destiny into your morning.
The Quantum Wallet always knows when you are about to buy the top.
A Pocket of Pause lets you freeze one awkward moment — single use.
The Mirror of Maybe shows who you’d be if you remembered small acts.
The Lightbulb of Ideas flickers in sympathy with brainstorms.
The Worn Map rewrites itself whenever you take a different path.
The Compass of Compliments always points to someone who needs one.
A Bottle of Tomorrow contains forecasts in tiny origami clouds.
The Paperweight of Persistence keeps good ideas from floating away.
The Giga-Key opens doors only if you promise to tell a joke when leaving.
A Continuity Sock can repair the ending of a short story.
Chrono-Chalk draws timelines you can step across — at the cost of memories.
The Silent Bell rings for things people haven’t said yet.
The Pen of Slight Exaggeration makes every sentence 6% more heroic.
